thread.title: New OU offensive coordinator eager to get first taste of Red River Showdown
thread.title_full: New OU offensive coordinator eager to get first taste of Red River Showdown | Dallas Morning News

author: Nichols
title: New OU offensive coordinator eager to get first taste of Red River Showdown
text:
First-year Sooners offensive coordinator Lincoln Riley is ready to take part in his first OU-Texas meeting. He is a Muleshoe, Texas, native and played and coached at Texas Tech.
"I grew up in the state and I have a sense of what the game is about," Riley said. "Any coach anywhere if they haven't would want to say they coached in the game. I can't wait."
On Twitter:
 @kHairopoulos
